name: RPG Maker VX RGSS Encrypted Archive
summary: Learn about .RGSSAD files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: To create a RGSSAD file: Select File â†’ Compress Game Data... then check the "Create Encrypted Archive" box.
NOTE: RGSSAD and RGSS2A files are used by RPG Maker VX, whereas RPG Maker VX Ace uses the .RGSS3A file extension.

description: Encrypted Archive file created by RPG Maker VX (RPGVX), a program used to create original role-playing games (RPGs); contains data and graphic files for the game; identical to the .RGSS2A file except it does not hold audio files; encrypted to protect original game material.
